interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: A Night to Remember (The Criterion Collection) [DVD]
Review Date: 2018/06/01
Store: Kenneth More  (Actor),     Honor Blackman  (Actor),     Roy Ward Baker  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Criterion Collection, All
Product Description: ['On April 14, 1912, just before midnight, the unsinkable Titanic struck an iceberg. In less than three hours, it had plunged to the bottom of the sea, taking with it more than 1,500 of its 2,200 passengers. In his unforgettable rendering of Walter Lord’s book of the same name,', 'A Night to Remember', ', the acclaimed British director Roy Ward Baker (', 'Don’t Bother to Knock', ') depicts with sensitivity, awe, and a fine sense of tragedy the ship’s final hours. Featuring remarkably restrained performances,', 'A Night to Remember', 'is cinema’s subtlest, finest dramatization of this monumental twentieth-century catastrophe.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, Documentary/Biography', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Black & White, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Roy Ward Baker, Kenneth More, David McCallum, Tucker McGuire, Honor Blackman, Michael Goodliffe', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 3 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.4 x 7.5 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CRRN2134DVD', 'Director': 'Roy Ward Baker', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Black & White, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '2 hours and 3 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 27, 2012', 'Actors': 'Kenneth More, Honor Blackman, Michael Goodliffe, David McCallum, Tucker McGuire', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Criterion Collection', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: This version is the most historically accurate version out. Except for the actual sinking. We all know that the ship broke in half. But in 1958 they didn’t know that. I strongly recommend the 2 dvd special edition. It has an interview with Eva Hart, a Titanic survivor.  Very interesting.
Review Title: I strongly recommend the 2 dvd special edition
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

A Charlie Brown Christmas 50th Anniversay Deluxe Edition (DVD)
Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Holidays & Seasonal, Christmas
["Christmastime is here. Happiness and cheer. And for Peanuts fans everywhere, it just wouldn't be Christmas without this classic holiday delight. Christmas lights may be twinkling red and green, but Charlie Brown has the Yuletide blues. To get in the holiday spirit, he takes Lucy's advice and directs the Christmas play. And what's a Christmas play without a Christmas tree? But everyone makes fun of the short, spindly nevergreen Charlie Brown brings back - until the real meaning of Christmas works its magic once again.", 'CHARLIE BROWN: Spruce up your Christmas cheer this year as Charlie takes on the spirit of Christmas in hopes to find the real magic of the season once again.', 'CHARLIE BROWN: Spruce up your Christmas cheer this year as Charlie takes on the spirit of Christmas in hopes to find the real magic of the season once again.', 'KEEPSAKE: It is the first TV special based on the comic strip Peanuts, by Charles M. Shultz. It has been honored with an Emmy and a Peabody Award and has become an annual tradition in the United States.', 'KEEPSAKE: It is the first TV special based on the comic strip Peanuts, by Charles M. Shultz. It has been honored with an Emmy and a Peabody Award and has become an annual tradition in the United States.', 'DELUXE ADDITION: This deluxe edition features It’s Christmastime Again, Charlie Brown. It also includes A Christmas Miracle: The Making of a Charlie Brown Christmas.', 'DELUXE ADDITION: This deluxe edition features It’s Christmastime Again, Charlie Brown. It also includes A Christmas Miracle: The Making of a Charlie Brown Christmas.', 'OFFICIALLY LICENSED: This Classic Charlie Brown story is officially licensed by Peanuts and is 100% authentic.', 'OFFICIALLY LICENSED: This Classic Charlie Brown story is officially licensed by Peanuts and is 100% authentic.', 'GIFTABLE: Gift this Anniversary Deluxe DVD for new generations and even older ones as the perfect stocking stuffer.', 'GIFTABLE: Gift this Anniversary Deluxe DVD for new generations and even older ones as the perfect stocking stuffer.']

A favorite childhood memory. There’s nothing I don’t like about the movie.
A precious Christmas tradition.
Ultimate Disaster Pack (Earthquake / Airport / The Hindenburg / Rollercoaster) [DVD]
Burt Lancaster  (Actor),     Charlton Heston  (Actor),     James Goldstone  (Director),     Mark Robson  (Director, Producer)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure
["Danger, destruction and mayhem…the Ultimate Disaster Pack features four blockbuster films filled with natural and manmade catastrophes that will blow you away. The pulse pounding action begins with Earthquake, an Academy Award-winning film about heroes rising after a catastrophic earthquake levels Los Angeles. The suspense continues with the original Airport, nominated for 10 Academy Awards including Best Picture, which launched the popular 1970s disaster film genre and became a box office smash. One of aviation's most infamous events in history is brought back to life in The Hindenburg, a gripping suspense thriller that reveals the intricate plots behind the historic airship disaster of 1937. Unexpected twists and turns await in Rollercoaster when a determined terrorist targets America's most popular attraction, and its riders, for senseless destruction. Featuring all-star casts that include Charlton Heston, Burt Lancaster, Dean Martin, George C. Scott, George Segal and many more, the Ultimate Disaster Pack will pull you in and never let you go!"]

I’m a disaster film collector.  I was pleased with this collection.
If you love disaster films this is a good collection to have. Great value at good price.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests**: The user maintains a strong affinity for classic holiday films, particularly animated and family-oriented content, while also displaying a growing interest in disaster films, revealing a taste for high-stakes narratives and action-packed storytelling.
- **Traditions**: Values nostalgic experiences and childhood memories, seeking out content that evokes emotions, holiday spirit, and thrilling narratives, with a notable appreciation for historical accuracy and depth in storytelling.
- **Movie Preferences**: Enjoys timeless and culturally significant films associated with family gatherings and celebrations, along with classic disaster films that feature ensemble casts and substantial narratives. The user's recent engagement with a historical disaster film highlights an interest in documentaries and biographical dramas, particularly those that delve into real-life events.
- **Gifting Attitude**: Likely to consider collectible or giftable media, especially during the holidays, as thoughtful presents. The user also appreciates comprehensive collector's sets that highlight specific genres, demonstrating a desire for quality and depth in their collections.
- **Quality Judgment**: Tends to rate content highly, reflecting a focus on personal enjoyment and broader cultural appreciation. The user exhibits a willingness to recommend quality releases that enhance the understanding of significant historical events.

Overall, the user displays a well-rounded appreciation for diverse cinematic experiences that combine family-friendly themes with intense, historically rooted narratives.
